unnormalised: Remember to link your PAN card (e.g., ABCDE1234F) with your Aadhaar card before 31/03/2024 to avoid penalties, and ensure your GSTIN (e.g., 06AAACC1234A1ZJ) is updated for seamless business operations.
normalised: remember to link your P-A-N card (e.g., A-B-C-D-E one two three four F) with your Aadhaar card before thirty first march two thousand and twenty four to avoid penalties, and ensure your G-S-T-I-N (e.g., zero six A-A-A-C-C one two three four A one Z-J) is updated for seamless business operations.
